DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined type of a geoscience observation. This type may associate additional specific property sets.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset, or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
